    • Content

      /* TESSLightbulbsDataPrep.do */
/** The Lightbulb Paradox
 @author Allcott and Taubinsky */
* 



/* PARAMETERS */
global WTPTopCode = 15
global WTPTopCode1 = 12
global WTPTopCode2 = 20
global StatedWTPMax = 100

*****

use "Data/TESS3 125 Allcott_Fielding2_Weighted Data_111813.dta", clear



/* Weights */
** If one wanted to weight for national representativeness
	* http://quickfacts.census.gov/qfd/states/00000.html
*gen NationalWeight = round(weight*313914040*(1-0.235)/1253) // Current US population is 313,914,040 as of 2013, of whom 23.5% are younger than 18.
gen NationalWeight = weight
*gen Weight = 1
gen Weight = weight

* Odd means that the CFL is on the left in the tables.
gen odd=0
replace odd = 1 if XT==1|XT==3|XT==5|XT==7|XT==9|XT==11|XT==13|XT==15

rename CaseID ID

** Endline-only group
gen EndlineOnly = cond(XDECIDE == 2,1,0)

** Treatment groups
rename XT group

* 0 = control, 1=Treatment (Balanced), 2=Positive Only Treatment (TP)
gen treat =0
replace treat =1 if group<5
replace treat =2 if group>8
gen T = 0
replace T=1 if treat==1|treat==2
gen TP=0
replace TP = 1 if treat==2
gen TB=0
replace TB = 1 if treat==1

/* Info Treatment Quiz */
	* Note: QT1_Dollar_Initial and analogous variables are missing if they are unchanged in QT1_Dollar, so missing doesn't imply wrong or that the respondent refused to enter it.
gen InfoTreatmentQuizFirstPrompt = QT1_PROMPT1
replace InfoTreatmentQuizFirstPrompt = QP1_PROMPT1 if QP1_PROMPT1 != .

gen InfoTreatmentQuizSecondPrompt = QT1_PROMPT2
replace InfoTreatmentQuizSecondPrompt = QP1_PROMPT2 if QP1_PROMPT2 != .

gen InfoTreatmentQuizDollar = QT1_Dollar
replace InfoTreatmentQuizDollar = QP1_Dollar if QP1_Dollar!=.

gen InfoTreatmentQuizCorrect = cond(InfoTreatmentQuizDollar==40,1,0) if T==1




/* GET WILLINGNESS-TO-PAY */
/* First check for monotonic switching */
gen flag_NonMonotonic1 = 0
forvalues d = 1/15 {
	if `d'>1 {A
		forvalues dp = 1/`d' {
			replace flag_NonMonotonic1 = 1 if Q1_Decision_`dp'==2&Q1_Decision_`d'==1
		}
	}
	if `d' < 15 {
		forvalues dp = `d'/13 {
			replace flag_NonMonotonic1 = 1 if Q1_Decision_`dp'==1&Q1_Decision_`d'==2
		}
	}
}
gen flag_NonMonotonic2 = 0
forvalues d = 16/30 {
	if `d'>16 {
		forvalues dp = 16/`d' {
			replace flag_NonMonotonic2 = 1 if Q5_Decision_`dp'==2&Q5_Decision_`d'==1
		}
	}
	if `d' < 30 {
		forvalues dp = `d'/30 {
			replace flag_NonMonotonic2 = 1 if Q5_Decision_`dp'==1&Q5_Decision_`d'==2
		}
	}
}





/* Generate WTP */
**** For Q1
* Get relative WTP for the right vs. left choice
gen WTP1 = .
replace WTP1 = -$WTPTopCode if Q1_Decision_15 == 1 // Top-coded
replace WTP1 = -9 if Q1_Decision_15 == 2
replace WTP1 = -7 if Q1_Decision_14 == 2
replace WTP1 = -5 if Q1_Decision_13 == 2

forvalues d = 12(-1)5 {
	local w = -1*(`d'-8.5)
	replace WTP1 = `w' if Q1_Decision_`d' == 2
}

replace WTP1 = 5 if Q1_Decision_4 == 2
replace WTP1 = 7 if Q1_Decision_3 == 2
replace WTP1 = 9 if Q1_Decision_2 == 2
replace WTP1 = $WTPTopCode if Q1_Decision_1 == 2 // Top-coded


* Replace so that WTP1 is relative WTP for the CFL
replace WTP1 = WTP1*(-1) if odd==1


**** For Q5
* Get relative WTP for the right vs. left choice
gen WTP2 = .
replace WTP2 = -$WTPTopCode if Q5_Decision_30 == 1 // Top-coded
replace WTP2 = -9 if Q5_Decision_30 == 2
replace WTP2 = -7 if Q5_Decision_29 == 2
replace WTP2 = -5 if Q5_Decision_28 == 2

forvalues d = 28(-1)21 {
	local w = -1*(`d'-24.5)
	replace WTP2 = `w' if Q5_Decision_`d' == 2
}

replace WTP2 = 5 if Q5_Decision_19 == 2
replace WTP2 = 7 if Q5_Decision_18 == 2
replace WTP2 = 9 if Q5_Decision_17 == 2
replace WTP2 = $WTPTopCode if Q5_Decision_16 == 2


* Replace so that WTP2 is relative WTP for the CFL
replace WTP2 = WTP2*(-1) if odd==1



** Many non-monotonic answers appear to be garbage. Not clear how to calculate their relative WTP anyway.
replace WTP1 = . if flag_NonMonotonic1 == 1
replace WTP2 = . if flag_NonMonotonic2 == 1

** Get the difference in WTPs
gen WTP2_WTP1 = WTP2-WTP1

** Generate an indicator for being in the Excess Mass Area.
gen ExcessArea = cond(WTP2>=-2&WTP2<=4,1,0) if T==1
label var ExcessArea "1(WTP2 in Excess Mass Area)"


/* Top-Coded WTPs */
** WTP1
	gen StatedWTP1_Abs = Q1_A_Dollar
	replace StatedWTP1_Abs = Q1_B_Dollar if Q1_B_Dollar!=.
	* 25 people changed their choices after being prompted to put in their top-coded WTP, suggesting that they didn't want to be top-coded. Make these missing
	replace StatedWTP1_Abs = . if WTP1!=$WTPTopCode&WTP1!=-$WTPTopCode
	gen StatedWTP1 = StatedWTP1_Abs
	* Replace so that WTP1 is relative WTP for the CFL
	replace StatedWTP1 = StatedWTP1*(-1) if WTP1==-$WTPTopCode

	gen StatedWTP2_Abs = Q5_A_Dollar
	replace StatedWTP2_Abs = Q5_B_Dollar if Q5_B_Dollar!=.
	* 14 people changed their choices after being prompted to put in their top-coded WTP, suggesting that they didn't want to be top-coded. Make these missing
	replace StatedWTP2_Abs = . if WTP2!=$WTPTopCode&WTP2!=-$WTPTopCode
	gen StatedWTP2 = StatedWTP2_Abs
	* Replace so that WTP1 is relative WTP for the CFL
	replace StatedWTP2 = StatedWTP2*(-1) if WTP2==-$WTPTopCode
	
	
	** Robustness check for top-coding of WTP
	forvalues d = 1/2 {
		* Alternative assumed values
		gen WTP`d'_top1 = WTP`d'
		replace WTP`d'_top1 = -$WTPTopCode1 if WTP`d'_top1==-$WTPTopCode
		replace WTP`d'_top1 = $WTPTopCode1 if WTP`d'_top1==$WTPTopCode
		gen WTP`d'_top2 = WTP`d'
		replace WTP`d'_top2 = -$WTPTopCode2 if WTP`d'_top2==-$WTPTopCode
		replace WTP`d'_top2 = $WTPTopCode2 if WTP`d'_top2==$WTPTopCode
		
		* Stated WTP
		gen WTP`d'_top3 = WTP`d'
		replace WTP`d'_top3 = StatedWTP`d' if WTP`d'_top3==$WTPTopCode | WTP`d'_top3==-$WTPTopCode
		
		* Stated WTP up to a cap of $StatedWTPMax
		gen WTP`d'_top4 = WTP`d'_top3
		replace WTP`d'_top4 = $StatedWTPMax if WTP`d'_top4>$StatedWTPMax & WTP`d'_top4!=.
		replace WTP`d'_top4 = -$StatedWTPMax if WTP`d'_top4<-$StatedWTPMax & WTP`d'_top4!=.
	}

/* Get beta and delta from stated time preference questions */
*** First identify non-monotonic switchers
gen flag_NonMonotonic10 = 0
forvalues d = 1/9 {
	if `d'>1 {
		forvalues dp = 1/`d' {
			replace flag_NonMonotonic10 = 1 if Q10_1_`dp'==2&Q10_1_`d'==1
		}
	}
	if `d' < 9 {
		forvalues dp = `d'/9 {
			replace flag_NonMonotonic10 = 1 if Q10_1_`dp'==1&Q10_1_`d'==2
		}
	}
}


forvalues d = 10/18 {
	if `d'>10 {
		forvalues dp = 10/`d' {
			replace flag_NonMonotonic10 = 1 if Q10_1_`dp'==2&Q10_1_`d'==1
		}
	}
	if `d' < 18 {
		forvalues dp = `d'/18 {
			replace flag_NonMonotonic10 = 1 if Q10_1_`dp'==1&Q10_1_`d'==2
		}
	}
}


	* rNow is amount of money required to make you indifferent between $100 now and X in one year.
	* rNow/100 = R = 1+r
gen rNow = .
gen rLater = .

forvalues t = 1/2 {
	if `t' == 1 {
		local first = "Now"
		local second = "Later"
	}
	else {
		local first = "Later"
		local second = "Now"
	}
	** First half of table
	replace r`first' = 300 if Q10_`t'_9 == 1 // Top-code value
	replace r`first' = 225 if Q10_`t'_9 == 2
	replace r`first' = 185 if Q10_`t'_8 == 2
	replace r`first' = 160 if Q10_`t'_7 == 2
	replace r`first' = 140 if Q10_`t'_6 == 2
	replace r`first' = 120 if Q10_`t'_5 == 2
	replace r`first' = 105 if Q10_`t'_4 == 2
	replace r`first' = 95 if Q10_`t'_3 == 2
	replace r`first' = 70 if Q10_`t'_2 == 2
	replace r`first' = 40 if Q10_`t'_1 == 2 // Bottom-code value

	** Second half of table
	replace r`second' = 300 if Q10_`t'_18 == 1 // Top-code value
	replace r`second' = 225 if Q10_`t'_18 == 2
	replace r`second' = 185 if Q10_`t'_17 == 2
	replace r`second' = 160 if Q10_`t'_16 == 2
	replace r`second' = 140 if Q10_`t'_15 == 2
	replace r`second' = 120 if Q10_`t'_14 == 2
	replace r`second' = 105 if Q10_`t'_13 == 2
	replace r`second' = 95 if Q10_`t'_12 == 2
	replace r`second' = 70 if Q10_`t'_11 == 2
	replace r`second' = 40 if Q10_`t'_10 == 2 // Bottom-code value
}

replace rNow = . if flag_NonMonotonic10 == 1
replace rLater = . if flag_NonMonotonic10 == 1

* Get beta and delta
	* Intuition: Low beta means present bias. For these people, rNow is high relative to rLater. Thus, relatively low rLater implies present bias.
gen beta = rLater/rNow
gen delta = 100/rLater // delta = 1/(1+r)
gen beta_1 = cond(beta<1,1,0)







/* PREP FOLLOW-UP SURVEY QUESTIONS AND TESS PROFILE VARIABLES */
/* Q7: Belief elicitation about energy costs */
* Correct answer: $36 less
* Q7A: More = 1, Less = 2
replace Q7B_Cent = 0 if Q7B_Cent_Codes==-1 // Refused probably means zero cents here.
gen Q7CFLSavings = cond(Q7A==2,Q7B_Dollar+Q7B_Cent/100,-1* (Q7B_Dollar+Q7B_Cent/100) )
gen Q7Error = abs(36-Q7CFLSavings)



/* Loan availability */
replace Q8 = . if Q8==-1
gen Awareness = 6-Q8


/* Political ideology */
* Left wing is higher numbers
* PARTY7: 7 is most Democrat, 1 is most Republican
gen Party = cond(PARTY7>0,PARTY,.)

gen Liberal = cond(IDEO > 0, 8-IDEO,.)


*** Normalize Party, Liberal, and Awareness
foreach var in Party Liberal Awareness {
	sum `var' [aweight=Weight]
	replace `var' = (`var'-r(mean) )/ r(sd)
}

/* Environmentalist */
gen Environmentalist = .
replace Environmentalist = 1 if ppp20116 == 1
replace Environmentalist = 0.5 if ppp20116 == 2
replace Environmentalist = 0 if ppp20116 == 3

/* Residential Energy Credit */
gen EnergyTaxCredit = .
replace EnergyTaxCredit = 1 if ppp20115 == 1
replace EnergyTaxCredit = 0 if ppp20115 == 2

/* Most important issue is Env or Energy
gen IssEnvEnergy = cond(pppa0233!=-1&pppa0233!=.,0,.)
replace IssEnvEnergy = 1 if pppa0233==13|pppa0233==10
 */
 
/* EnvScore */
* Sum of other Environmentalist questions
gen EnvScore = 0
replace EnvScore = EnvScore+1 if ppp10240==13|ppp10240==10 // Most important issue is Energy or Environment
replace EnvScore = EnvScore+1 if ppp20111==1 // Purchased a product because it was made from recycled materials
replace EnvScore = EnvScore+1 if ppp20105==1 // Given money to an environmental organization
replace EnvScore = EnvScore+1 if ppp20106==1 // Contributed time or expertise to an environmental rights organization

/* ConserveEnergy */
gen ConserveEnergy = .
replace ConserveEnergy = 1 if ppp20112 == 1
replace ConserveEnergy = 0 if ppp20112 == 0


/* Income */
gen Income = .
replace Income = 2500 if PPINCIMP == 1
replace Income = 6250 if PPINCIMP == 2
replace Income = 8750 if PPINCIMP == 3
replace Income = 11250 if PPINCIMP == 4
replace Income = 13750 if PPINCIMP == 5
replace Income = 17500 if PPINCIMP == 6
replace Income = 22500 if PPINCIMP == 7
replace Income = 27500 if PPINCIMP == 8
replace Income = 32500 if PPINCIMP == 9
replace Income = 37500 if PPINCIMP == 10
replace Income = 45000 if PPINCIMP == 11
replace Income = 55000 if PPINCIMP == 12
replace Income = 67500 if PPINCIMP == 13
replace Income = 80000 if PPINCIMP == 14
replace Income = 92500 if PPINCIMP == 15
replace Income = 112500 if PPINCIMP == 16
replace Income = 137500 if PPINCIMP == 17
replace Income = 162500 if PPINCIMP == 18
replace Income = 225000 if PPINCIMP == 19
replace Income = Income/1000 // Income is now in $thousands.

gen lnIncome = ln(Income)

/* Education */
* This is grade completed. If X OR Y, code the higher of {X,Y}
gen Education = .
replace Education = 0 if PPEDUC == 1
replace Education = 6 if PPEDUC == 3 
replace Education = 8 if PPEDUC == 4
replace Education = 9 if PPEDUC == 5 
replace Education = 10 if PPEDUC == 6 
replace Education = 11 if PPEDUC == 7 
replace Education = 12 if PPEDUC == 8 // 12th grade no diploma
replace Education = 12 if PPEDUC == 9 
replace Education = 14 if PPEDUC == 10 
replace Education = 14 if PPEDUC == 11
replace Education = 16 if PPEDUC == 12
replace Education = 18 if PPEDUC == 13 // Master's
replace Education = 20 if PPEDUC == 14 // Professional or Doctoral



/* Other Demographics */
rename PPAGE Age
gen Male = cond(PPGENDER==1,1,0)

gen OwnHome = cond(PPRENT == 1, 1, 0)



/* Initial Beliefs about CFL Savings */
**** Use Q7 for Control
* Normalize within T and C to mean zero, SD 1. Positive means overestimate CFL savings, negative means underestimate.
gen CFLSavingsBiasC = Q7CFLSavings-36

** Use Q2TA and Q2PA for treatment and Positive Treatment groups
foreach g in P T {
	replace Q2`g'B_Cent = 0 if Q2`g'B_Cent_Codes==-1 // Refused probably means zero cents here.
	gen Q2`g'CFLSavings = cond(Q2`g'A==2,Q2`g'B_Dollar+Q2`g'B_Cent/100,-1* (Q2`g'B_Dollar+Q2`g'B_Cent/100))
}
gen Q2CFLSavings = cond(TP==1,Q2PCFLSavings,Q2TCFLSavings)
gen CFLSavingsBiasT = Q2CFLSavings-4.5

gen CFLSavingsBias = cond(T==1,CFLSavingsBiasT,CFLSavingsBiasC)

** Generate percentile of bias variable
	* Rationale: Q2 and Q7 frame things slightly differently (8 years vs. 1 year), so we need to compare 
	* percentiles within the T and C distributions. 
	* Doing anything different could cause differences in the mean or distribution 
	* of Q2 vs. Q7 answers to skew the results.
sum T if T==0
local NQ = r(N)
xtile CFLSavingsBiasPctileT = CFLSavingsBiasT [pweight=Weight] if T==1, nq(`NQ')
xtile CFLSavingsBiasPctileC = CFLSavingsBiasC [pweight=Weight] if T==0, nq(`NQ')
gen CFLSavingsBiasPctile = cond(T==1,CFLSavingsBiasPctileT,CFLSavingsBiasPctileC)

foreach var of varlist CFLSavingsBiasPctile* {
	replace `var' = `var'*100/`NQ'
}


/* Q9 (Demand Effects) Questions */
** Make missing if refused
foreach var in a b c d e f g h i j {
	replace Q9_`var' = . if Q9_Refused==1
}


/* Q11 (Self-Monitoring Scale) Questions */
foreach var in a b c d e f {
	replace Q11_`var' = . if Q11_`var' == -1
	* Normalize to mean=0, sd=1
	sum Q11_`var'
	replace Q11_`var' = ( Q11_`var' - r(mean) ) / r(sd)
}
* d and f are framed as lower scores = more malleable
foreach var in d f {
	replace Q11_`var' = -1*Q11_`var'
}
egen Q11_Combined = rowmean(Q11_*)


/* ADDITIONAL VARIABLES AND FINAL DATA PREP FOR REGRESSIONS */
** Get WTP1_C* variables: indicators for each WTP1 level
* Positives
foreach w in 150 90 70 50 35 25 15 5 {
	gen WTP1_C`w' = cond(WTP1==`w'/10,1,0) if WTP1!=.
}
* Negatives
foreach w in 5 15 25 35 50 70 90 150 {
	gen WTP1_Cn`w' = cond(WTP1==-`w'/10,1,0) if WTP1!=.
}


** Get WTP1_S* variables: indicators for each WTP1smooth level
	* WTP1smooth collapses outlying values of WTP1 for estimates of MTEs at each value of WTP1smooth.
gen WTP1smooth = WTP1
replace WTP1smooth = 9 if WTP1>=9 
replace WTP1smooth = -3.5 if WTP1<=-3.5

* Positives
foreach w in 90 70 50 35 25 15 5 {
	gen WTP1_S`w' = cond(WTP1==`w'/10,1,0) if WTP1!=.
	gen TxWTP1_S`w' = cond(WTP1==`w'/10,T,0) if WTP1!=.
}
* Negatives
foreach w in 5 15 25 35 {
	gen WTP1_Sn`w' = cond(WTP1smooth==-`w'/10,1,0) if WTP1!=.
	gen TxWTP1_Sn`w' = cond(WTP1smooth==-`w'/10,T,0) if WTP1!=.
}



** 
gen Q7CFLSavingsCorrect = cond(Q7CFLSavings>=36&Q7CFLSavings<=40,1,0) if T==1



/* Label variables */
label var T "1(Treatment)"
label var TP "1(Positive Treatment)"
label var TB "1(Balanced Treatment)"
label var WTP1 "Baseline Willingness-to-Pay"
label var EndlineOnly "1(Endline-Only)"
label var beta "Present Bias $\beta$"
label var delta "Discount Factor $\delta$"
label var beta_1 "1($\beta<1$)"
label var Income "Income (000s)"
label var Education "Education (Years)"
label var ConserveEnergy "Conserve Energy"
label var OwnHome "Homeowner"

** Self-Monitoring Scale
label var Q11_a "Important to fit in"
label var Q11_b "Behave as others wish"
label var Q11_c "Good intuition for others' motives"
label var Q11_d "(-1)*Behavior an expression of true feelings"
label var Q11_e "Regulate my actions"
label var Q11_f "(-1)*NOT change opinions to please someone"
label var Q11_Combined "Self-Monitoring Mean"

** Beliefs
label var InfoTreatmentQuizCorrect "1(Pass Treatment Info Quiz)"
label var Q7CFLSavingsCorrect "1(Correct Post-Experiment Beliefs)"

save Calculations/PreppedTESSData.dta, replace
